kernfrasen: soul of Jonathan was knit to the soul of David
loved him as his own soul
putting your happiness into someone else’s happiness
sucks all of the joy out
assets to come into me and enhance me
starts just like a headache, but so do brain tumors

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: Sin is crouching at your door... a predatory animal.

cognitieve_implicaties: Sin is an external agent with its own will.
theologische_implicaties: Sin is not just an act but a power that enslaves.
ethische_implicaties: Vigilance is required; passive sinning leads to destruction.
onbedoelde_consequenties: May diminish personal agency if sin is seen as a separate 'beast'.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher revitalizes the Genesis 4 metaphor by linking it to 'Crouching Tiger' and modern predatory behavior.

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: Putting your happiness into someone else’s happiness.

cognitieve_implicaties: My joy is dependent on your success.
theologische_implicaties: Union with Christ/Others creates a shared emotional economy.
ethische_implicaties: Rejoicing with those who rejoice becomes a logical necessity.
onbedoelde_consequenties: Could be interpreted as codependency in a secular psychological framework.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: Moves beyond 'love is a feeling' to a spatial/transactional mapping of joy.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The preacher uses the 'Throne' as a central architectural and political metaphor to unify the concepts of envy (wanting the throne), love (getting off the throne), and salvation (letting God rule).

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The 'deal' of salvation is framed as the ultimate 'abdication' of the self-throne.

sterktes.beschrijving: Re-activates the 'Sword' metaphor by explaining the physical vulnerability of handing the hilt to a rival.
sterktes.voorbeeld: You don’t put your sword in their hand. You put your sword in their belly.

risicos.beschrijving: Using 'the better end of the deal' to describe salvation risks framing grace as a savvy business move.
risicos.voorbeeld: Who do you think is going to get the better end of that deal?

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: The Royal Court of Israel (Saul, David, Jonathan).
sub_worlds: The inner psychological space of the 'itching' ego

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: High; connects 'schadenfreude' to modern news consumption.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: Reinforced through the 'Throne' and 'Command me' imagery.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Mapping it to a brain tumor and a crouching predator.
verstoorde_schemas.vervangend_schema: Envy as a deadly, self-replicating power.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Fits a standard 'Law and Gospel' movement.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by the 'LIFE IS A KINGDOM' metaphor, where the heart is a throne. It successfully shifts from a Juridical view of sin to a Relational/Ontological view (Sin as a predator/disease). The use of the 'Economic' domain to describe love ('assets', 'enhancement') provides a sharp critique of modern consumerist relationships.

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Connect the 'stripping of the robe' to the 'washing' to show the cost of the garment.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: Jesus didn't just wash us; he traded his royal silk for our blood-stained rags.

coherentie_verbeteringen.incoherentie: God as Judge vs. God as 'letting you go'.
coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Explicitly link the 'Natural Law' of sin's consequences to the 'Divine Verdict'.

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: Suggests sin is an external force rather than internal choice.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Clarify that we 'feed' the animal through our choices.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To contrast the 'growth' of envy with the 'fruit' of the spirit.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using CMT to deconstruct a 'polite' sin and reconstruct a Christocentric alternative.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: Focuses on the cognitive mapping of 'Throne' rather than the beauty of the prose.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Prioritizes the conceptual structure of the 'Harmful Spirit' over the experiential learning cycle.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: Reveals how the preacher uses 'Container' logic to redefine love as 'putting happiness into' another.

appendices.notities: The preacher heavily relies on Jonathan Edwards and C.S. Lewis for source domain material.
